title: Tanglefoot Moonshiner debuts rigid steel mountain bike for alternative adventures
content:
The new Tanglefoot Moonshiner may be the biggest departure we’ll see this year from modern trail bike trends. But this mega plus-tire, rigid steel mountain bike blends a lot of classic bike style & construction with just the right dose of modern technology and hardware, creating a bike in the end that could take off-road […]

The post Tanglefoot Moonshiner debuts rigid steel mountain bike for alternative adventures appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
